data.title: Craig Butler on LinkedIn: Nilesh Nilkanth Oak Returns: UNTOLD Realities Of Mahabharat, Ramayana &…
data.meta_description: The Mahabharata offers knowledge that’s not being discussed
data.text:
Exploring the complex history of Nagorno-Karabakh, MPP student Vivek Kalhan Reshi Raina writes about the tale of territorial integrity and self-determination in his blog. Click here https: bit.ly/45UTpvD to learn more about the complexities across borders. #KautilyaPublicPolicy #kautilyastudentblog #KautilyaSchoolOfPublicPolicy #Kautilya #blogs

Watch Amish answer on ‪@TheLallantop‬ whether the Ramayan is historical fact or mythical legend. Dive into this fascinating discussion. What do you think? Is it a historical text, a myth, or perhaps a blend of both? Share your thoughts in the comments below! Video Source - ‪@TheLallantop‬ #HistoryOrMyth #Ramayan #Lallantap #amish #indianwisdom #indianhistory #ramchandraseries #Ram #Sita #Ravaan #waroflanka https://lnkd.in/gNXbaDvQ

TERRITORIES (JUNE 2019 Gautam Shah ) https://lnkd.in/fyj3pYm Territories emerge where the commonalities of concepts, or ideologies are intense in time and space. A territory is an acknowledged area ability, fields of activity or domain of experience. Territories emerge as social groups with compatible manners. Political territories are zones marked by confirmation to an administering power. A Territory is a continuing process that gets reshaped into multiple sections, but still the holistic nature of the original persists. Inversely, conquest of adjacent territories to form a kingdom has not worked well. The basic need for governance is the reach of control and communication.
